resources.string: Find the nth probable prime in the background using AsyncTask
Find the nth probable prime using AsyncTask, displaying indeterminate progress dialog
Find the nth probable prime using AsyncTask, displaying a determinate progress bar
Find the nth probable prime with cancellation
Retained Headless Fragment to continue AsyncTask processing across activity restarts
One Activity incorporating all of the chapter 2 examples for comparison
Handler example, using post(Runnable) to update the view
Network IO on a background thread, sending messages to the main thread
HandlerThread example - sending messages back and forth between HandlerThread and main thread
Handler example - consuming sensor events on a HandlerThread and updating the UI to show a compass pointer
Send an image from the gallery app, loads thumbnail in the background using a Loader
Demonstrates use of a CursorLoader to list image filenames from the MediaStore on a background thread
Combines examples 1 & 2 to display a tiled grid of thumbnails from the MediaStore
Demonstrates use of AsyncTaskLoader to perform background calculations
open your gallery app, choose an image and "send" it to this activity
Demonstrates using an IntentService to perform long-running calculations, returning results via messenger
Demonstrates using an IntentService to perform long-running calculations, returning results via broadcast or notification
Demos uploading an image to a remote server using IntentService (your images are safe, the server never stores them)
Enter N to find Nth Prime
Invoke a Service with Intents, perform multiple concurrent calculations, return results via messenger
Invoke a Service via Messenger, perform multiple concurrent calculations, return results via messenger
